author: ra ra
comment: Initially worked fine as a Phone finder and I was impressed, then when I tested for range, nothing happened, Subsequent taps gave the Android UAHS (Unfortunately, this app has stopped) message. Then when invoking from apps menu just rang once and stopped. Maybe a bug in the Android SDK...who knows.   I also tested for range by putting both phone and SW3 in airplane mode.  Trying this out again after being put off by Wear Aware's long alarms

author: Ruell Calvin Brown
comment: I would leave my phone in the car by accident and it alerts me usually pretty quickly. The ring phone feature seems to have issues. It rings for a second and stops. I don't know if it's the app's fault or not.
title: Useful at times

author: Clint Smith
comment: I just want to find my watch. I don't want to set up so many steps as far as passwords, device permissions, etc. Just find my watch. If I want anything beyond that, allow me the CHOICE to do it.
title: App over complicated.

comment: When I have my smart watch switched to priority notifications, if my phone goes out range the watch doesn't vibrate but only shows the notification card. I even tried adjusting the apps specific notifications setting and making it a priority app, but that didn't work. Otherwise, it does what it says.
title: Doesn't work with priority notifications

author: Mike Rampanelli
comment: It used to work. It will tell me if my phone is out of range but the find my phone feature no longer works.
title: No longer works.

author: ozan avci
comment: i revoke the device admin from the app, but still i am not able to remove it! what is wrong with this app?
title: how!

author: Chris Bateson
comment: Installed gave it Device Admin Permission.  It disabled my Smartlock settings, removed device admin and uninstalled and Smartlock settings are still disabled with no way of getting it back.
title: Had to wipe my phone after installing this

author: Winston Cheng
comment: I don't seem to be getting Alerts about my phone being out of range anymore.  The other features I care about are covered by Android Device Manager.

comment: It crashing my phone and making it randomly shutdown

comment: It won't let me delete it It takes up space on my pc I  HATE IT!
title: Ugh!

comment: For the life of me i cant get this to work i know its me but geez can figure out how it works
title: Nexus 6

comment: It's so hard to uninstall the app

comment: Thank you, devs! Nexus 5 (5.0.1 LRX22C) + LG G Watch (square, 5.0.1 LWX48P)).
title: It works perfectly!

author: Alan Brown
comment: Does not work at all!!!!
title: Rubbish

author: Tony Zhaocheng Tan
comment: Very useful to ensure that the phone is secured when out of range.
title: Great app

author: Nicholas Brickhouse
comment: Great app
title: Works as advertised.

author: Jaida Smith
comment: I don't like it I hate it

author: Nabil Kamalmaz
comment: Good

author: Steve Myers
title: I want the radar shown in the picture.

author: Jon Clark
comment: On the Moto 360 there's a delay. For instance, I'll leave my phone in the car, run into a store really quickly and it doesn't alert me until I am back in my car. This didn't happen on the LG G Watch when I had it. It would alert me the second I was out of range.
title: Great app but...

comment: After the last update my Motorola Moto X second generation quit working. I called Verizon and they had me do a factory reset. After a week of trial and error and a replacement phone I narrowed it down to this application. My dialer quit working (closed immediately upon opening) as well as my messaging application and both Waze and Google Maps. After I uninstalled the application both phones worked. Bingo! Love my Moto 360 smart watch and my Motorola Moto X second generation - just not with this application.
title: Horrible! Stay away! Do not download as your phone will not work.

author: Jason Ballard
comment: Note 4 works fine. When you leave the vicinity on the phone the message on the watch says "you phone" vs "your phone" which is kind of annoying.
title: It's Okay

author: runman1271
comment: It works very well.  I like the feature that it locks your phone when you are out of blue tooth range.  Great free app  I have a Note 4.
title: Very cool App

author: Alexandros Kastanis
comment: Behaves exactly as expected, it will definitely become useful since I installed it right after I found my phone.
title: One trick wonder

author: luis
comment: I can't uninstall this app. I exchanged my watch and no longer have use for this app
title: Can't uninstall

author: Juan Carlos Lopez
comment: Though I wouldn't complain since it's free.
title: It's good but can be better

author: Gulam Faruque
comment: World's exactly as expected
title: Great app

author: Bernard P
comment: Great app
title: Superb

author: Kenneth Ng
comment: It seems no way to uninstall the app like other apps does.  Really disappointed on why Google can pass this app into the store

reply.author: Track My Fitness
reply.content: Kenneth, did the uninstall instruction help?

title: good until you want to uninstall it

author: Jesus M. Hernandez
comment: This app can't be installed. So be careful when installing. After a while I found how to uninstall app.
title: Can't uninstall (fixed)

author: Joe Cohen
comment: At first it wouldn't because I didn't use the password setting. After using password it JUST WORKS. Awesome functionality. Would love to see if you can get it to work with other forms of verified access. Like the pattern and such.
title: Autolock goodness

author: Johnny Swinson
comment: There are several apps like this, but I like this the best because it auto locks your phone. I feel good that my phone is always secure.
title: Works great

author: Jon Barrymore
comment: Please tell me how to remove this app off my htc phone
title: Remove

author: D Ng
comment: Works well but takes time to set it up, great ap

author: swit kisz
comment: Love the auto lock feature
title: Great tool for Android Wear

author: Rob Hoehn
comment: Works perfectly as described. Exactly what I was looking for.
title: Great app.

author: Adam Steinmark
comment: I'm going insane with this app. It was alright but now it just keeps randomly shutting phone screen off when I'm using it and sending notifications to my watch every time it does but the notifications vibrate then disappear instantly. I tried to deactivate device admin and uninstall but it won't let me. I hit the deactivate button and nothing happens. Please help.

reply.author: Track My Fitness
reply.content: Early Android Wear OS has occasional bugs where it keeps on reporting the watch is disconnected. That is why you are seeing the lock. We notice the recent Android Wear update is much more stable. Please give it a try. Also, to deactivate device admin, sometimes a reboot is required, again, it is an Android limitation.

title: Was okay - now making me crazy

author: sammy mens
comment: Very nice feature for our smart watches
title: it works

author: Jerry Pena
comment: Works great on my LG G Watch
title: Great!!!
